title: Pokemon Scarlet, Pokemon Violet Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 02.28.22
description:
Happy Monday -- you get two new Pokemon games! Greg and Tim run your through all the Poke-news.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:25 - Housekeeping
Euphoria S2 Screencast!
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Gordon McGuire, James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes), Pranksy, Manny The Bagel boy Sanchez, & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:08:25 - Pokemon Scarlet and Pokemon Violet Announced, Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:21:50 - Adam Recaps the rest of the Poke-Announcements @ IGN
00:25:30 - Do you think Pokemon Legends: Arceus was intended to be much more of a smaller side project than it ended up being?  - Best Friends Q:Tommy Goodale
00:31:50 - BREAKING: TWISTED METAL
00:37:15 - WND: No Smash At Evo, Ethan Gatch @ Kotaku
00:46:40 - Elden Ring Fastest Selling Souls Game So Far in UK, Christopher Dring @ GIB
00:47:50 - Elden Ring Killing on Steam
00:54:13 - Game Pass on Steam? Gabe’s Open to it! Eddie Makuch @ GameSpot
00:56:26 - Out today
00:58:55 - Squad Up:Turangaliila(Everything)
01:00:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Whitta
